TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Jim_Brewer, title = Jim_Brewer, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jim_Brewer} }

S.FORM: Jim Brewer nalecuhan i Maywood, Illinois, nanu syubay kanas-mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, pahanhanan tu kawaw ayza. Jim Brewer i 1973 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 1 ku uwac atu silsil 2, namapili' tu nu San Diego Rockets putiput. 12 bulad 3 demiad, 1951 a mihca, Jim Brewer, miunduay. u canan ku NBA kanatal kanas-mali putiput, Amilika: National Basketball Association, sapuyu'en NBA, u Amis-Amilika tatama syubay kanas-mali putiput. izaw 30 a mali cebang, mikitinay tusa a subal, sawaliyan atu satipan. cacay subal izaw tulu a cu, cacay a cu izaw lima a cebang, cacay cebang namakay Canada, u zama sa namakay Amilika. kya madademec "Amilika syubay kanas-mali nisakaput sasasedsed, acasa "Amilika kanas nisakaput sasasedsed", sapuyu'en "Amilika syubay kanas", acasa kakelul han NBA.

Jim Brewer nalecohan i Maywood, Illinois, nano syobay kanas-mali miondoay no Amilika NBA nisakapot, pahanhanan to kawaw ayza. Jim Brewer i 1973 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 1 ko owac ato silsil 2, namapili' to no San Diego Rockets potipot. 12 bolad 3 demiad, 1951 a mihca, Jim Brewer, miondoay. o canan ko NBA kanatal kanas-mali potipot, Amilika: National Basketball Association, sapoyo'en NBA, o Amis-Amilika tatama syobay kanas-mali potipot. izaw 30 a mali cebang, mikitinay tosa a sobal, sawaliyan ato satipan. cacay sobal izaw tolo a co, cacay a co izaw lima a cebang, cacay cebang namakay Canada, o zama sa namakay Amilika. kya madademec "Amilika syobay kanas-mali nisakapot sasasedsed, acasa "Amilika kanas nisakapot sasasedsed", sapoyo'en "Amilika syobay kanas", acasa kakelol han NBA.
